clinical_history: Patient with persistent infection and fever of unknown origin.
findings: Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in adrenal gland, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
